mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.comment_create, c.content, c.topic_id, t.title FROM `comment` c left JOIN topicinfo t ON c.topic_id = t.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.comment_create desc

SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.comment_create, c.content, c.agree_num, c.is_accept, c.topic_id, u.`name`, u.avatar_url, u.role FROM `comment` c LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.account_id = c.user_id WHERE c.topic_id = #{tid} LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
mapper.update: UPDATE `comment` SET agree_num = agree_num + 1 WHERE topic_id = #{tid}
UPDATE `comment` SET agree_num = agree_num - 1 WHERE topic_id = #{tid}
